name: See No Evil (itch) (BinChickenStudios)
description:

SEE NO EVIL is a VR horror game demo that will challenge players to investigate and escape a haunted mansion, while avoiding the spirits within.

Each room has several key items and clues that have to be found in order for you to progress to the next level. Your goal is to investigate these items to learn more about the story, which will in turn help you escape the house
